title: Listener Stories: Vol. 62
description: Christmastime is here! Join Em wrapped in Christmas lights and Allison for some spiked hot chocolate with peppermint schnapps and wilted whipped cream! We cover all things holiday from haunted snow globes to potentially sitting on the lap of a murderous mall Santa. We also have one of five of Em's menches on benches and some funky fresh ice cubes... and that's why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (em schulz, Allison Goforth, Christine Scheiffer, Eva Gross)
